subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Calm thyself-again and again and again.....
author: Rj
full_text:
--0-414376114-1250462268=:4415
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Twisting a prediction after the fact to fit circumstances is one of the big=
gest mistakes (or biggest cop-outs, or biggest lies) a would-be future-tell=
er makes.=A0 The predictions you were touting were for August 15, and inclu=
ded end-of-the-world warning..=A0 Trying to say these were correct, but not=
 REALLY for August 15, and not REALLY end-of-the-world stuff, seems like a =
way to save face, or keep hoping the messages are real, when in fact, this =
is another example that they are not.

So from now on, you will no longer h=
ear clear dates and predictions.=A0 You may hear vague dates and vague pred=
ictions if you like, but you will not hear anything that can be confirmed.=
=A0 Doing so would put you in a position of having to question the verity o=
f the EVP data you collect.=A0 And that might lead to abandoning this while=
 area of study.=A0 And we know you cannot do that.



--- On Sun, 8/16/09, =
Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <pu=
rplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Calm thyself-again and again an=
d again.....
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, August 16, 2009, 3:0=
8 PM






=A0




    
                  =A0Well, it seems the original pr=
ediction of the east coast getting clobbered is probably correct. Where=A0I=
 fell down was trying to ask questions and getting BS doomsville junk. I kn=
ew it's a mistake=A0to ask questions, that like opens the door for the dark=
 dorks. I'm going back to just announcing I'm doing an EVP recording, and j=
ust record. They know what I'm thinking and what I need to know and who I w=
ould like to hear from. Asking questions, at least for me, has always lead =
to problems. I'm not like others, presumming I'm so smart and know what is=
=A0talking, and if it's honest, like most of=A0the box experts out there on=
 the web. You know, the ones doing pod casts, radio shows=A0and proclaiming=
 this that and the other thing. 

=A0
=A0
=A0
=A0Frank-S

 

      

    
 =
